Name: 寂静破碎
About the game: Hello, everyone. This is not a particularly formal and complete game Presented only as personal works, permanently free of charge. This is a post apocalyptic realistic TPS game. Compared with dead silence, you can not only use guns. Facing zombies at will, you can also use rich role skills to fight zombies. You not only need to remove the remaining zombies in the map, but also need to resist the attack of zombie wave. You can survive in the dilapidated world to win the final victory. Now the game has two maps, a total of eight levels for exploration and challenge. Thank you very much.
